title: Philips and sustainability at COP28 - News - Philips
summary: Philips, a health technology company, is committed to sustainable healthcare practices. They aim to reduce their environmental impact through energy efficiency, resource efficiency, and care pathway optimization. Philips has partnered with other companies to create renewable energy projects and is committed to reducing their Scope 3 emissions.
product_or_process: Renewable energy projects and reduction of Scope 3 emissions

title: Apple 'Scary Fast' Mac Event: Revving Up the Tech World - Daily Investor Hub
summary: Apple held its 'Scary Fast' Mac event, unveiling new Mac models powered by custom-made M3 chips, offering faster performance and improved battery life. The event showcased the new iMac, MacBook Pro models with M3 Pro and M3 Max chips, and software updates like macOS Monterey. Apple continues to innovate with custom silicon and prioritize privacy and security, expanding its services offerings with bundled subscriptions.
